description: This is a **comprehensive foundational course** for aspiring web developers. You will master the essentials of **HTML5** for structuring content and **CSS3** for styling and layout. The class covers topics like semantic HTML, CSS box model, Flexbox for responsive design, and basic typography. By the end, you'll be able to confidently build and deploy basic, well-structured, and aesthetically pleasing static websites from scratch. **Perfect for complete beginners** with no prior coding experience.

Join our **Gentle Hatha yoga sessions** designed specifically to help you manage and reduce daily stress. The focus is on **mindful movement**, combining beginner-friendly physical postures (asanas) with deep, restorative **breathwork (pranayama)**. We will practice simple meditation and relaxation techniques to calm the nervous system, improve flexibility, and enhance overall mental clarity. **Suitable for all fitness levels**.

These are **intermediate level (B1)** conversational French sessions structured around engaging, real-world topics. The goal is to dramatically improve your **spoken fluency**, natural pronunciation, and ability to hold extended discussions. We'll use short readings, current events, and role-playing to expand your vocabulary and solidify intermediate grammar concepts in a relaxed, supportive environment. **A basic understanding of French is required.**

Transform your everyday snapshots into professional-looking images by mastering the **fundamentals of photographic composition**. This class covers essential concepts like the **Rule of Thirds**, using **leading lines** to guide the viewer's eye, effective **framing**, and understanding symmetry versus asymmetry. We’ll analyze great photographs and apply these techniques to your own work, making your photos more compelling and visually impactful. **Bring any camera (DSLR, mirrorless, or smartphone).**

Gain the confidence to tackle those small, annoying household projects yourself! This **hands-on guidance** class focuses on fixing **common household issues** that save you time and money. Topics include how to quickly stop a **leaky faucet**, basic **drywall patching** and spackling, simple electrical fixes like replacing a light switch, and securing loose cabinet hinges. Learn to use essential tools safely and effectively. **No prior experience necessary.**

Unlock your digital creativity using the powerful **Procreate app** on the iPad. This **step-by-step tutorial** will guide you through the interface, brush customization, layering techniques, and color palettes. You'll learn how to sketch, ink, and color a complete digital illustration, focusing on blending and texture application. **Required: iPad, Apple Pencil, and the Procreate app installed.**

Experience the joy of authentic Italian cuisine! In this delicious workshop, you will learn the traditional methods for making fresh pasta dough from scratch, and then prepare **three classic Italian pasta dishes**: a perfect Cacio e Pepe, a rich Tagliatelle al Ragù, and a vibrant Pesto Genovese. We cover ingredient selection, kneading techniques, and pairing the right sauce with the right pasta shape. **Includes recipes and tasting session.**

Take control of your financial future! This introductory course covers the essential pillars of personal finance: effective **budgeting** and tracking expenses, building an **emergency savings fund**, managing and improving your credit score, and understanding the basics of **investment concepts** like stocks and mutual funds. Get practical tools and strategies for achieving long-term financial security. **Ideal for young professionals and students.**

Elevate your React skills by gaining a **deep dive into advanced JavaScript (ES6+) features**. This session focuses on topics highly relevant to modern React development, including asynchronous JavaScript (Promises, Async/Await), destructuring, the spread/rest operators, and functional programming concepts. Understanding these concepts is essential for writing cleaner, more efficient, and scalable React code. **Prerequisite: Working knowledge of basic JavaScript and React fundamentals.**

Discover the transformative power of a mindful life. This course introduces **simple meditation techniques** that you can easily incorporate into your daily routine. Learn how to focus your attention, observe thoughts without judgment, and practice body scan meditation to enhance self-awareness. The goal is to help you **calm the mind**, reduce feelings of stress and anxiety, and find greater peace in your everyday life. **No special equipment needed.**

Planning a trip to a Spanish-speaking country? This **beginner (A1) level** course provides you with all the essential phrases and basic grammar needed for practical, everyday interactions. You'll learn greetings, how to order food, ask for directions, navigate transport, and handle simple transactions. The focus is on **pronunciation and conversational utility** to ensure you can communicate effectively while traveling. **Starts with no prior knowledge assumed.**

A rewarding **practical workshop** where you will complete a tangible project: building a stylish and functional small wooden shelf. You will learn fundamental woodworking skills including safe operation of hand tools, precise measurement, proper techniques for **cutting, joining, and sanding**, and applying a quality wood finish. All materials and tools are provided. **Great for beginners looking for a hands-on introduction to carpentry.**

Conquer your fear of speaking in public and learn to command an audience. This session provides actionable **exercises and tips** to help you **overcome nervousness** (glossophobia), structure a compelling narrative, use body language effectively, and deliver presentations that are clear, confident, and impactful. Through practice and constructive feedback, you will gain the skills to communicate persuasively in any setting.

Bring life to your indoor spaces! Learn the essential skills for successfully caring for **potted houseplants**. This course covers crucial topics such as determining the correct light requirements for different species, mastering **proper watering techniques**, understanding fertilizer needs, and knowing when and how to perform **rep potting** to keep your plants healthy and thriving year-round. Say goodbye to brown thumbs! **Perfect for apartment dwellers and plant enthusiasts.**

Lay the essential groundwork for playing the piano by focusing entirely on **understanding musical notation**. This course will teach you how to read the Grand Staff, recognize and play notes on both the treble and bass clefs, understand time signatures, rhythm (whole, half, quarter, eighth notes), and basic dynamics. This knowledge is crucial for anyone serious about learning to play the piano independently. **Ideal for absolute beginners to music theory.**

Take your watercolour skills beyond the basics! This intermediate class explores advanced techniques to add depth and texture to your paintings. We will practice the delicate **wet-on-wet** method for soft blends, methods for **lifting** pigment to create highlights, using **masking fluid** to preserve white areas, and layering glazes for rich color depth. **Prerequisite: Basic experience with watercolour paint and paper.**
